summary: GlovePIE script for 'W" of 'WASD' when walking or running on the wii balance board
descriptionHtml:
This is a GlovePIE script to use running on the wii balance board to press 'W" of 'WASD'. While this was originally written to be used with skyrim, it should be possible to modify this script to work with most other games. You may need to edit some of the constants at the top of the script to be more tuned with your running speed.

Requirements: GlovePIE http://glovepie.org/glovepie_download.php and X-box + Keyboard mod http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30913/?
author: sarahn
